name: Forgotten Forest
overview: Blast your way through hordes of spiders, bees, bats, and other critters in this tribute to the Forbidden Forest games. However, instead of being armed with a bow and arrow, in Forgotten Forest, you are armed with a machine gun. This game was originally made for the 2011 Sideways SEUCK competition by Alf Yngve. It was also used as a sample in "Shoot Em Up Destruction Set 2"
